content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a polished_blackstone, I need to place blackstone in the crafting grid. I will move 1 blackstone from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1
